title: Bishop T.D. Jakes on Dual Crises
itunes:title: Bishop T.D. Jakes on Dual Crises
description:
Bishop T.D. Jakes, Chairman of the T.D. Jakes Foundation, discusses dual crises facing the nation. He says this is a time for collaboration. Bishop Jakes also shares strategies for creating a more equitable and diverse playing field.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
